SELECT BRD_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, RATING, BRD_GROUP, BRD_ORDER, BRD_INDENT, BRD_TITLE, BRD_CONTENT, BRD_READ_CNT, REG_DATE, BRD_PARENT, MOD_DATE, FILE_ORG_NAME, FILE_NAME, BRD_PWD FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, BRD_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, RATING, BRD_GROUP, BRD_ORDER, BRD_INDENT, BRD_TITLE, BRD_CONTENT, BRD_READ_CNT, REG_DATE, BRD_PARENT, MOD_DATE, FILE_ORG_NAME, FILE_NAME, CASE WHEN #{boardType} = 4 THEN BRD_PWD ELSE NULL END AS BRD_PWD FROM (SELECT A.BRD_SEQ, B.USER_ID, NVL(B.USER_NAME, '') USER_NAME, NVL(B.USER_EMAIL, '') USER_EMAIL, NVL(B.RATING, '') RATING, NVL(A.BRD_GROUP, 0) BRD_GROUP, NVL(A.BRD_ORDER, 0) BRD_ORDER, NVL(A.BRD_INDENT, 0) BRD_INDENT, NVL(A.BRD_TITLE, '') BRD_TITLE, NVL(A.BRD_CONTENT, '') BRD_CONTENT, NVL(A.BRD_READ_CNT, 0) BRD_READ_CNT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') REG_DATE, NVL(A.BRD_PARENT, 0) BRD_PARENT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.MOD_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') MOD_DATE, NVL(C.FILE_ORG_NAME, '') FILE_ORG_NAME, NVL(C.FILE_NAME, '') FILE_NAME,
NVL(A.BRD_PWD, '') AS BRD_PWD
NULL AS BRD_PWD
FROM
SPR_NOTICE A, SPR_USER B, NOTICE_FILE C
SPR_FREE A, SPR_USER B, FREE_FILE C
SPR_EXHIBITION A, SPR_USER B, EXHIBITION_FILE C
SPR_QNA A, SPR_USER B, QNA_FILE C
WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.BRD_SEQ = C.BRD_SEQ(+)
AND B.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND A.BRD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.BRD_CONTENT, #{searchValue}) > 0
ORDER BY A.BRD_GROUP DESC, A.BRD_ORDER ASC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT COUNT(A.BRD_SEQ) AS CNT
FROM SPR_NOTICE A, SPR_USER B
FROM SPR_FREE A, SPR_USER B
FROM SPR_EXHIBITION A, SPR_USER B
FROM SPR_QNA A, SPR_USER B
WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID
AND B.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND A.BRD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.BRD_CONTENT, #{searchValue}) > 0

NVL(A.BRD_PWD, '') AS BRD_PWD,

FREE_LIKEY F
